statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (3,-13) and (8,-3).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{3}-{\left(-{13}\right)}}}{{{8}-{\left({3}\right)}}}=\frac{{10}}{{5}} which reduces to \displaystyle{2} (if it's not already reduced)
